        "b[n_] := b[n] = If[PrimeQ[n], 1+b[PrimePi[n]], 0];",
        "a[n_] := a[n] = Module[{p}, p = If[n==1, 1, a[n-1]]; While[True, p = NextPrime[p]; If[#>3 && OddQ[#]&[b[p]], Break[]]]; p];",

    ],

        "(PARI) b(n)={my(k=0); while(isprime(n), k++; n=primepi(n)); k};",
